item.title: Human fouling, 20th October
item.description:

item.title: Bedroom furniture, mattress x 2, children's toys etc, 20th October
item.description:
Just watched the family who live in 10 Oslo square fly tipping a number of household items. These items were added to the fly tipped furniture they dumped late last night and the mattress they dumped last week. Please can southwark council remove the temporary ramp (installed for previous occupant) and re instate the iron railing fence, that allows the family to easily carry the items across the road to the green area on the opposite side of the road. If southwark council are not prosecuting or fining the family to stop them fly tipping on this site each week - can you please at least block the easy access
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plover Way, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet
